      • sortAlphabetically

        public void sortAlphabetically​(boolean flag)
        Sort the linked list of students alphabetically
        Overrides:
        sortAlphabetically in class LinkedListPerson
        Parameters:
        flag - "True" if the user has chosen to sort the linked list of people alphabetically, "false" if the user has chosen to unsort the list of people back into its original order (i.e. sort the list of people by date added)
